body_html:
Yeah, saved models aren't yet supported on Android mostly because the libraries they depend on are excluded from the Android binary to reduce binary size / dependencies.

This is a reasonable feature to work through. Though, the workaround suggested and/or use of TensorFlow Lite should be considered as well.

Marking this as "Contributions Welcome" in case anyone wants to take this one (it will mostly involve BUILD file management to keep the dependencies to a minimum).
body_text:
Yeah, saved models aren't yet supported on Android mostly because the libraries they depend on are excluded from the Android binary to reduce binary size / dependencies.
This is a reasonable feature to work through. Though, the workaround suggested and/or use of TensorFlow Lite should be considered as well.
Marking this as "Contributions Welcome" in case anyone wants to take this one (it will mostly involve BUILD file management to keep the dependencies to a minimum).
body:
Yeah, saved models aren't yet supported on Android mostly because the libraries they depend on are excluded from the Android binary to reduce binary size / dependencies.

This is a reasonable feature to work through. Though, the workaround suggested and/or use of [TensorFlow Lite](https://www.tensorflow.org/mobile/tflite/) should be considered as well.

Marking this as "Contributions Welcome" in case anyone wants to take this one (it will mostly involve `BUILD` file management to keep the dependencies to a minimum).
